Estimate the Nusselt Number from the Reynolds Number

Source: R/energybalance_functions.R
Nusselt_from_Reynolds.Rd

Estimate the Nusselt number from the Reynolds number for various taxa Mitchell (1976) Table 1 (Convective Heat Transfer Relations for Animal Shapes).

Nusselt_from_Reynolds(Re, taxa = "cylinder")

Arguments

Re

numeric is the Reynolds Number (dimensionless)

taxa

character Which class of organism, current choices: sphere, cylinder, frog, lizard_traverse_to_air_flow, lizard_parallel_to_air_flow, lizard_surface, lizard_elevated, flyinginsect, spider

Value

numeric Nusselt number (dimensionless)

References

Mitchell JW (1976). “Heat transfer from spheres and other animal forms.” Biophysical Journal, 16(6), 561-569. ISSN 0006-3495, doi: 10.1016/S0006-3495(76)85711-6 , https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0006349576857116.

See also

Other biophysical models: Grashof_number_Gates(), Grashof_number(), Nusselt_from_Grashof(), Nusselt_number(), Prandtl_number(), Qconduction_animal(), Qconduction_substrate(), Qconvection(), Qemitted_thermal_radiation(), Qevaporation(), Qmetabolism_from_mass_temp(), Qmetabolism_from_mass(), Qnet_Gates(), Qradiation_absorbed(), Qthermal_radiation_absorbed(), Reynolds_number(), Tb_CampbellNorman(), Tb_Fei(), Tb_Gates2(), Tb_Gates(), Tb_butterfly(), Tb_grasshopper(), Tb_limpetBH(), Tb_limpet(), Tb_lizard(), Tb_mussel(), Tb_salamander_humid(), Tb_snail(), Tbed_mussel(), Tsoil(), actual_vapor_pressure(), boundary_layer_resistance(), external_resistance_to_water_vapor_transfer(), free_or_forced_convection(), heat_transfer_coefficient_approximation(), heat_transfer_coefficient_simple(), heat_transfer_coefficient(), saturation_vapor_pressure(), saturation_water_vapor_pressure()

Examples

  Nusselt_from_Reynolds(Re   = 5, 
                        taxa = "cylinder")
#> [1] 1.301952
